faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How do I use AI assistants?
faq.answer1: Select the AI assistant you want from the home page or list page. A conversation will be started with the selected AI and you will be redirected to the live chat screen. You can record audio by pressing the microphone button or send a text message via keyboard.
faq.question2: How can I add or remove favorite AIs?
faq.answer2: You can add or remove AI assistants to your favorites by clicking the heart icon on them. You can view and manage your favorite AIs from the 'Favorite AI' section on the profile page.
faq.answer3: You can start audio recording by pressing the microphone button on the AI detail page. During recording, you can stop or pause the recording by pressing the button again. When the recording is complete, it is automatically sent to the AI and you receive a response.
faq.question4: How do I send a text message?
faq.answer4: You can open the keyboard by clicking the keyboard icon on the AI detail page. You can send your message by typing it in the text input field and pressing the send button. Text messages are sent directly to the AI and you receive a response.
faq.question5: How do I start and close a conversation?
faq.answer5: A conversation is automatically started when you select an AI assistant. To close the conversation, simply press the red phone button. This action closes both the WebSocket connection and the conversation.

help.aboutUsText: Application is a technology company founded in 2024, offering innovative technologies and user-oriented solutions. Our mission is to develop digital solutions that simplify and add value to daily life.
help.visionText: To be a leading and reliable brand in the digital world, providing innovative solutions that simplify the lives of our users and build a bridge between technology and people.
help.teamText: Our experienced and expert team consists of professionals, each specialized in their field. Our team, which constantly improves itself in the fields of technology, design, and user experience, works to provide the best service.
help.sustainabilityText: We value environmental sustainability, minimize paper usage with our digital solutions, and constantly work to reduce our carbon footprint.
help.contactText: You can use the contact channels below to reach us. We are always here for your questions and support requests.
help.address: Address: Sample Neighborhood, Technology Street No:123, Istanbul
help.supportText: For technical support and general inquiries, you can send an e-mail to support@application.com. Our customer service team will get back to you as soon as possible.
